languages.text: "Госпожа-то Вистенца Янус Вьятт аб Арам аф Коронус?" {n}Простолюдин выговаривает пышное имя без единой ошибки, только вздрагивает при каждом слове, будто его бьют палкой.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}Молимся об ее здоровье{/d} каждый день!"

"Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}The commoner pronounces the governor's florid name flawlessly, but every word makes him flinch like someone is hitting him with a stick.{/n} "We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}pray for her health{/d} every day!"
languages.original_text: "Госпожа-то Вистенца Янус Вьятт аб Арам аф Коронус?" {n}Простолюдин выговаривает пышное имя без единой ошибки, только вздрагивает при каждом слове, будто его бьют палкой.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}Молимся об ее здоровье{/d} каждый день!"

traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: “是维丝坦萨·加努斯·维亚特·阿布·阿拉姆·阿夫·科罗努斯吗？”{n}这个老人以完美无瑕的发音念出了总督华丽的名字，但每说一个字，他都抽搐一下，就好像有人在用棍子打他一样。{/n}“我们每天都{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}为她的健康祈祷{/d}！”
languages.original_text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}The commoner pronounces the governor's florid name flawlessly, but every word makes him flinch like someone is hitting him with a stick.{/n} "We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}pray for her health{/d} every day!"

traits.locale_text: “是维丝坦萨·加努斯·维亚特·阿布·阿拉姆·阿夫·科罗努斯吗？”{n}这个老人以完美无瑕的发音念出了总督华丽的名字，但每说一个字，他都抽搐一下，就好像有人在用棍子打他一样。{/n}“我们每天都为她的健康祈祷！”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: 「ヴィステンツァ・ヤヌス・ビャット・アブ・アラム・アフ・コロヌス？」{n}一般市民は、知事の華やかな名前を完璧に言ったが、単語を発音する度に、誰かに棒で叩かれているかのような動きをした。{/n}「我々は毎日、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}彼女の健康を祈っています{/d}！」
languages.original_text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}The commoner pronounces the governor's florid name flawlessly, but every word makes him flinch like someone is hitting him with a stick.{/n} "We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}pray for her health{/d} every day!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィステンツァ・ヤヌス・ビャット・アブ・アラム・アフ・コロヌス？」{n}一般市民は、知事の華やかな名前を完璧に言ったが、単語を発音する度に、誰かに棒で叩かれているかのような動きをした。{/n}「我々は毎日、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}彼女の健康を祈っています{/d}！」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: «¿Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?». {n}El plebeyo pronuncia el complejo nombre de la gobernadora de forma impecable, pero se estremece con cada palabra como si le estuvieran golpeando.{/n} «¡{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}Rezamos por su salud{/d} cada día!».
languages.original_text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}The commoner pronounces the governor's florid name flawlessly, but every word makes him flinch like someone is hitting him with a stick.{/n} "We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}pray for her health{/d} every day!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?». {n}El plebeyo pronuncia el complejo nombre de la gobernadora de forma impecable, pero se estremece con cada palabra como si le estuvieran golpeando.{/n} «¡Rezamos por su salud cada día!».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}Der einfache Mann spricht den blumigen Namen der Gouverneurin makellos aus, aber bei jedem Wort zuckt er zusammen, als würde ihn jemand mit einem Stock schlagen.{/n} "Wir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}beten jeden Tag für ihre Gesundheit{/d}!"
languages.original_text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}The commoner pronounces the governor's florid name flawlessly, but every word makes him flinch like someone is hitting him with a stick.{/n} "We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}pray for her health{/d} every day!"

traits.locale_text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}Der einfache Mann spricht den blumigen Namen der Gouverneurin makellos aus, aber bei jedem Wort zuckt er zusammen, als würde ihn jemand mit einem Stock schlagen.{/n} "Wir beten jeden Tag für ihre Gesundheit!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: « Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus ? » {n}L'homme prononce le nom complexe sans le moindre accroc, mais grimace à chaque mot, comme si quelqu'un le frappait avec un bâton.{/n} « On {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}prie pour elle{/d} tous les jours ! »
languages.original_text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}The commoner pronounces the governor's florid name flawlessly, but every word makes him flinch like someone is hitting him with a stick.{/n} "We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}pray for her health{/d} every day!"

traits.locale_text: « Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus ? » {n}L'homme prononce le nom complexe sans le moindre accroc, mais grimace à chaque mot, comme si quelqu'un le frappait avec un bâton.{/n} « On prie pour elle tous les jours ! »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus mu?" {n}Avam adam, valinin uzun adını kusursuzca telaffuz ediyor. Ancak her kelimesinde biri ona sopayla vuruyormuşçasına irkiliyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}Sağlığına{/d} dua ediyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus?" {n}The commoner pronounces the governor's florid name flawlessly, but every word makes him flinch like someone is hitting him with a stick.{/n} "We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}pray for her health{/d} every day!"

traits.locale_text: "Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus mu?" {n}Avam adam, valinin uzun adını kusursuzca telaffuz ediyor. Ancak her kelimesinde biri ona sopayla vuruyormuşçasına irkiliyor.{/n}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusVistenzaAlive}Sağlığına{/d} dua ediyoruz!"
traits.speaker: OldMan
